Description: Postcard; printed paper; hand coloured monochrome photograph showing the Francois Joseph quay, Port Said.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used; postmarked 31st December 1914; the pencilled message reads: "Dear little Ivy, please tell Mum I am sorry but I forgot to wish you all a Happy New Year in my letter, but will do it now & tell her I hope it will be a brighter year than the old one has been & tell her to write, love to all & kisses ....".
Associated names: Named in inscription: Miss Ivy Prior
